analysis.description:
Draw.withDraw (/unique_chucks/9/0x5ec28acd52fcdb9be4370d13d8fe3879cc9f5c22.sol#496-512) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- msg.sender.transfer(vault) (/unique_chucks/9/0x5ec28acd52fcdb9be4370d13d8fe3879cc9f5c22.sol#510-511)
_laffAddr in Draw.onDraw (/unique_chucks/9/0x5ec28acd52fcdb9be4370d13d8fe3879cc9f5c22.sol#404-405) is a local variable never initialiazed
_mostAddr in Draw.onDraw (/unique_chucks/9/0x5ec28acd52fcdb9be4370d13d8fe3879cc9f5c22.sol#404) is a local variable never initialiazed

Draw.drawNum_ should be constant (/unique_chucks/9/0x5ec28acd52fcdb9be4370d13d8fe3879cc9f5c22.sol#158-159)
Draw.times_ should be constant (/unique_chucks/9/0x5ec28acd52fcdb9be4370d13d8fe3879cc9f5c22.sol#157-158)
Draw.totalPot_ should be constant (/unique_chucks/9/0x5ec28acd52fcdb9be4370d13d8fe3879cc9f5c22.sol#149-152)
Parameter '_affCode' of Draw.joinDraw (/unique_chucks/9/0x5ec28acd52fcdb9be4370d13d8fe3879cc9f5c22.sol#216) is not in mixedCase

Draw.pNamexAddr_ (/unique_chucks/9/0x5ec28acd52fcdb9be4370d13d8fe3879cc9f5c22.sol#162-164) is never used in Draw
Draw.pAddrxFund_ (/unique_chucks/9/0x5ec28acd52fcdb9be4370d13d8fe3879cc9f5c22.sol#170-172) is never used in Draw
